title: For the Athkaar after fard, do you say Allahuakbar or Wallahuakbar
transcript: abdullah from canada i have a brief question and uh after the salah uh i've seen in uh the app that i have that when you say subpanel or 33 times after you do you say alhamdulillah or and after that you say allahu akbar it's the same so whether you say alhamdulillah subhanallah alhamdulillah or you say subhanallah alhamdulillah or you say subhanallah subhanallah subhanallah until you finish 33 then you say alhamdulillah alhamdulillah alhamdulillah 33 and allahu akbar the same it's all the same whether you say subhanallah or subhanallah it's the same there's no problem in that inshallah
